result.orig: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rud
result.html: B'é scéimhlitheoireacht an chéad rud a rith le daoine sular tháinig deimhniú gurbh iad cúinsí seismeacha ba chúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.
result.ponchtml: B'é scéiṁliṫeoireaċt an ċéad rud a riṫ le daoine sular ṫáinig deiṁniú gurḃ iad cúinsí seismeaċa ba ċúis leis an rudThe first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.orig: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.html: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!

result.eng: It has to be remembered that...
result.ga: Caithfear cuimhneamh go
result.orig: Caithfear cuimhneamh go
result.html: Caithfear cuimhneamh goIt has to be remembered that...
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfear cuiṁneaṁ goIt has to be remembered that...

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ga: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.orig: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.html: Má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ponchtml: Má tá teaċ mór agus culaiṫ ṁaiṫ éadaiġ aigesean altaíoḋ sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.

result.eng: The man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ga: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.orig: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.html: Tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anochtThe man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ponchtml: Tá braon ar bord ag an ḟear anoċtThe man has a drink taken tonight.

result.eng: He has something to cry about.
result.ga: Is aige atá ábhar na ndeor
result.orig: Is aige atá ábhar na ndeor
result.html: Is aige atá ábhar na ndeorHe has something to cry about.
result.ponchtml: Is aige atá áḃar na ndeorHe has something to cry about.
